entry.title: Monday night: Showers. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this evening. Showers beginning after midnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 16 May 2016

entry.title: Tuesday: Showers. High 6.
entry.summary: Showers ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 2 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 6. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Monday 16 May 2016
